reviews.review_msg: Crim 355-This course is easy- just put time into the paper but easy A if you study.

I must say, I found the prof to be the opposite of all the reviews on her so far.  She was a good professor, that new the material and was always able to help.  She made the class easy and an instant A.  I am taking the next forensics with her.
I didn't think it was possible but she managed to make forensic sciences boring.  She's smart but she's a horrible speaker and not engaging at all.

i as well was disappointed to see lynne instead of gail and the entomology lecture proved me (and several of us) right. she was boring and unorganized with the lecture slides. she also tried to apply her british humour into her lectures. only positive part of this course was TA's and easy marking scheme (so far)

it was an easy class but the prof made it so uninteresting.. with her thousands of "um...", her lecture made me fall asleep all the time.. very bad prof... never take a class with her... her notes, very very unorganized...

I was SOOO disappointed when I came on day 1 and saw Lynn instead of Gail Anderson. And my disappointment was continued when Lynn started the lecture. She was so disorganized and unhelpful in lecture. She posts slides online but then ignores the order and won't let us copy new slides saying we should listen to her incoherent ramble instead.
